proverb_text: It is too late to spare when the Borrom is bare

references.author: Tav.
references.location: It is to late sparinge at the botome.

references.author: Songs and Bal. Philip and Mary
references.location: To latte they spare, when all ys goone.

references.author: Cooper
references.location: Sera parsimonia in fundo, It is to late to spare when the barell is at the bottome.

references.author: G. Harvey
references.location: Too late sparing at the bottum; where nothing left, but the least, and last.

references.author: Bacon
references.location: Thrift is too late [when you come] to the bottom of your stock.

references.author: CL.
references.location: Too late to spare when all is spent.

references.author: W.S. Countrym. Commonw.
references.location: It is too late for a prodigal to spare at the bottom.

similar_proverbs.text: When all is consumed repentance comes too late
Better spare at the brim than at the bottom
